name: Dream Legend 18: Street Soccer
description:
The most skilled soccer stars grew up playing football in the street. Some of them, change to a professional league if they have the chance, but others... Other players live the street soccer and the urban league as a way of life and they would never change it for fame or glory.

Now it is your turn to be the next star of the urban league and become the next legend of the urban league. Start scoring your first goal and progress through the levels to reach the highest level of this competition. Your destiny as the top striker of the urban league is waiting for you. You will make history!

Enjoy the street soccer experience and the features of this urban league game now:
- Shoot the most important penalty of your life and become a legend of the street soccer.
- Practice to master the free kick, the dribbles and the flick shoot to be the winner the tournament!
- People are waiting for the next star of the streets. It is your time to show off you will be a legend!
- Progress through the different levels and tournaments and face the best goalkeepers of the world!
- Enjoy being a legend of the goal kick in this free game!
- Unlock the item packs to boost your star to the highest level of this free game!
- Compete against your friends scoring the best goal of your career.

There will be a only champion of the goal kick in this street soccer game! Do you think you can turn your football star into a legend? Let's find out now! Jump to the street and start scoring your first goal! Play now!
